plugin.name: Daily Journal
plugin.description: Support for daily journalling in NotePlan, including start-of-day template, and end-of-day review questions
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: dayStart
plugin.commands.description: Start today's daily note with a template, including local weather lookup

plugin.commands.name: dayReview
plugin.commands.description: Ask journal questions for an end-of-day review

plugin.preferences.name: openWeatherAPIKey
plugin.preferences.description: API key to use the openWeather service

plugin.preferences.name: latPosition
plugin.preferences.description: Latitude position to send to the openWeather service

plugin.preferences.name: longPosition
plugin.preferences.description: Longitude position to send to the openWeather service

plugin.preferences.name: openWeatherUnits
plugin.preferences.description: Units that the openWeather service returns

plugin.preferences.name: templateText
plugin.preferences.description: Template text to add to each daily note at the start of day

plugin.preferences.name: reviewSectionHeading
plugin.preferences.description: Heading after which to put  the review responses

plugin.preferences.name: reviewQuestions
plugin.preferences.description: Comma-separated list of review questions to ask
plugin.preferences.default:
@work(<int>)
@fruitveg(<int>)
Mood:: <mood>
Gratitude:: <string>
God was:: <string>
Alive:: <string>
Not Great:: <string>
Wife:: <string>
Remember:: <string>

plugin.preferences.description: Comma-separated set of possible moods to choose between
